demos.input: {"feedback":"DEPENDIENTAS PRIMOR GARBERA SAN SEBASTIAN \nFatal experiencia, te siguen por toda la tienda y rondan constantemente la zona en la que estás incomodandote , de manera muy des carada, todo para saber si robas, te tratan de ladrón desde que entras, por favor que cuiden eso!","from_language":"SPANISH","to_language":"ENGLISH"}
demos.reasoning: Translate the feedback from Spanish to English, maintaining the style, format, emphasis, punctuation, and other details.
demos.output: {"translation":"PRIMOR GARBERA SAN SEBASTIAN CLERKS \nTerrible experience, they follow you around the store and constantly hover in the area where you are, making you uncomfortable in a very blatant way, all to see if you steal. They treat you like a thief from the moment you enter. Please take care of this!"}

demos.input: {"feedback":"Pesima atención al cliente en pedidos online\nEl día 28 de enero hice un pedido online y casi dos semanas esperando me decido a mirar el estado de mi pedido y pone que ha sido entregado el día 1 de febrero . Me pongo en contacto con el servicio de atención al Cliente para decir que mi pedido no ha llegado y me dicen que van a hablar con la empresa de transporte. Al día siguiente me llama un transportista y me dice que yo le dije que lo dejara en el felpudo cuando me llamo por teléfono porque no estábamos en casa. He mandado pantallazo de las llamadas telefónicas y de las llamadas al telefonillo de la casa y ese día no me llamo nadie a ninguno de los sitios. TENGO PRUEBAS DE QUE NO LO HAN ENTREGADO. Y aún me contesta primor que el transportista se pasará a hablar conmigo para aclararlo… no confiéis en esta tienda para hacer pedidos porque no se hacen responsables si ocurre algo con el transporte. Es una vergüenza","from_language":"SPANISH","to_language":"ENGLISH"}
demos.reasoning: Translate the feedback from Spanish to English while preserving the style, format, emphasis, emojis, punctuation, names, measures, units, and dates.
demos.output: {"translation":"Terrible customer service for online orders\nOn January 28th, I placed an online order and after almost two weeks of waiting, I decided to check the status of my order and it says it was delivered on February 1st. I contacted Customer Service to say that my order has not arrived and they told me they would talk to the delivery company. The next day, a delivery person called me and said that I told him to leave it on the doormat when he called me because we were not at home. I sent screenshots of the phone calls and the intercom calls from the house and no one called me that day at any of those places. I HAVE PROOF THAT IT WAS NOT DELIVERED. And yet Primor responds that the delivery person will come by to talk to me to clarifyâ€¦ Do not trust this store for orders because they do not take responsibility if something happens with the delivery. It’s a disgrace"}

demos.input: {"feedback":"I prodotto acquistati sono belli mi piacciono e anche i tessuti sono abbastanza buoni","from_language":"ITALIAN","to_language":"ENGLISH"}
demos.reasoning: Translate the Italian feedback into English while maintaining the original style, format, and emphasis.
demos.output: {"translation":"The purchased products are beautiful, I like them, and the fabrics are quite good"}

demos.input: {"feedback":"Massive Werbeunterbrechungen\nDie Werbeunterbrechungen lassen überhaupt keinerlei Sehvergnügen mehr zu, da hilft nur noch die kündigung","from_language":"GERMAN","to_language":"ENGLISH"}
demos.reasoning: Translate the feedback from German to English step by step while preserving the original style and formatting.
demos.output: {"translation":"Massive advertising interruptions\nThe advertising interruptions do not allow any viewing pleasure anymore, the only solution is to cancel"}
